recipe:
Easy Vegetable Lentil Curry
2 Tbsp oil 4 Tbsp green curry paste 2-4 garlic cloves crushed 200gm butternut and regular pumpkin chopped 1 sweet potatoe peeled and chopped 1-2 carrots chopped 2 cups red lentils 4 stock cubes 100 gms frozen spinach 4-6 cups of water (add 6 cups if you like it more runny or less if you prefer it more solid- I add one stock cube per cup)
Heat oil in a large pot and cook garlic for 2 minutes then add curry paste and cook for a further 2-3 mins. Add all other ingredients except spinach and cook until veggies are soft, about 20-40 mins. Add spinach and stir until completely mixed through. Serve with rice, yogurt and coriander sprinkled on top- Top Notch!
